name: Dance or Die
description:
Two twin brothers who grew up together one day bump heads over who can dance the best and get into a fight, resulting in one of the brothers being kicked out of the house in which the other brother owned. Leaving you with no choice but to find a way to make some money in order to survive on your own. Your character then runs into a tournament called "Dance or Die" which is a tournament that takes street dancers and engages them in combat, allowing them to use their dance and fighting skills in order to defeat the other opponent. Its now up to your character in the game to fight to the top and become the dance or die champion, will someone stand in your way? play to find out.

Watch Trailer - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x7939daZtNc&list=UUIWLIvyOVM2ybFEtQtMP8EQ
